players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I'm shocked and saddened by Charlie's sudden demise. Let's all try to stay focused on finding out who did this."
Diana: "Charlie's death is a tragedy, and I'm committed to uncovering the truth behind it. As a detective, I'll do my best to help us figure out what happened."
You: "I'm confident that the truth will come to light in due time. Let's all work together and share any information we may have, no matter how insignificant it might seem."
